name: strawberries and pear with sugar on top
description: I wanted a very light fruit mix with a dash of sugar on top.  Smooth strawberry with a lingering pear aftertaste.  Overnight steep but longer if you want more cream.  I personally enjoy it fresh!
author: Zooter

reviews.text:
Nice recipe. Very easy to vape. I'm digging it!
Thanks!!!
Mixepic summed it up nicely. I too enjoyed this recipe but feel it needs some adjusting to bring it to "wow". Great job Zooter.

After 30ml's I think it's a good profile but could use some separation within the fruit base. They become rather muddled together and difficult to determine which one you're tasting. Maybe the raspberry is bringing them too close together and forcing itself in the middle. However, I did enjoy the bottle I made, the sugar on top was very evident and well done.
